title: New: Slow Shudder – Call You Back
body:
London’s **Slow Shudder** (aka Amanda Mayo) makes quite the impression on her debut single, _Call You Back_.

Merging some real early 00’s pop vibes with some real of the moment production, it’s a bold first offering, reminiscent of the likes of Flume, Grimes and Purity Ring. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
